summary: This document is an email from August 13, 2019, regarding overtime staffing and post assignments at a correctional facility for the dates of August 9-10, 2019. It requests the Warden to provide details on mandated versus voluntary overtime, and includes a reference to a Regional Director for the Northeast Region. The document appears to be internal administrative communication, possibly related to facility operations during a period of heightened attention.

persons.name: Warden
persons.context: The recipient of a request to provide data on mandated versus voluntary overtime for staff on August 9-10, 2019.

persons.name: Regional Director Northeast Region
persons.context: Mentioned in the document's metadata or signature line, indicating oversight of the Northeast Region.

events.title: Friday Overtime Staffing
events.description: On Friday, August 9, 2019, from 4pm to 12am, there were 21 posts with 20 staff present and 6 overtimes. Additional day watch posts were noted: 10 posts (6am-2pm), 36 posts (8am-4pm), and 13 posts (2pm-10pm).

events.title: Saturday Overtime Staffing
events.description: On Saturday, August 10, 2019, from 12am to 8am, there were 19 posts with 18 staff present and 10 overtimes.

keyFacts: The document details overtime staffing and post assignments at a correctional facility for August 9-10, 2019.
It requests the Warden to distinguish between mandated and voluntary overtime for those dates.
The communication is dated August 13, 2019, and references a Regional Director for the Northeast Region.
The staffing data shows significant overtime usage, with 6 overtimes on August 9 and 10 overtimes on August 10.
The document is administrative in nature, focusing on facility operations and staffing logistics.
